title: an adjunct professor at several universities in the United States and Asia, providing PCB design and layout seminars to corporate clients worldwide. Mr. Montrose has authored several textbooks published by Wiley and IEEE Press: EMC and the Printed Circuit Board—Design, Theory and Layout Made Simple, 1999 (translated into Chinese and Japanese), and Printed Circuit Board Design Techniques for EMC Compliance—A Handbook for Designers
